price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Nea Onim ͻsoro ne asaase so ahuntasεm no na Osiane baeε. Nokorε sε, Ɔne Bͻnefakyε Hene, Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: قُلۡ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul anzalahu alladhī yaʿlamu al-sira fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu kāna ghafūran raḥīman
